channel.title: Electron on Sundar
channel.description: Recent content in Electron on Sundar

item.title: A no/low code developer platform for building ML & RPA solutions
item.description: This low code platform’s objective is to ease the lives of ML and RPA developers by providing a visual drag and drop interface to build solutions for ML and RPA needs. Architected the entire platform right from ground up. Tech Stack Frontend React as UI library Redux for state management REST APIs for CRUD Electron for desktop application Backend NestJS for business logic ML microservices NodeRed for low-code development DataStore MongoDB Integrations MLFlow for machine learning lifecycle Programming Languages TypeScript JavaScript Python
